title: Upscaling shifts all the frames
body:
Hi

I am trying to upscale some episodes of the Samurai Pizza Cats I have, but from the looks of it the upscaler shifts the entire image / frame. 

**How the output looks like:**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17492906/167697163-92bc0c0a-bfb8-4f69-8c5e-443d8ad19fb8.png)

**What the input looks like:**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17492906/167709648-f9410249-c30c-4956-99fa-42255636fc43.png)

This is the command I used to run upscale my input with
`docker run -it --rm --device=/dev/dri -v $PWD:/host ghcr.io/k4yt3x/video2x:LATEST -i ./input/01.mkv -o ./output/01.mkv -p3 upscale -h 720 -a waifu2x -n3`

Codec details of the input

```
Video                                                   
ID                                       : 1 
Format                                   : AVC
Format/Info                              : Advanced Video Codec
Format profile                           : High@L4.1
Format settings                          : CABAC / 11 Ref Frames
Format settings, CABAC                   : Yes 
Format settings, Reference frames        : 11 frames     
Codec ID                                 : V_MPEG4/ISO/AVC
Duration                                 : 21 min 5 s
Bit rate                                 : 2 800 kb/s
Width                                    : 768 pixels
Height                                   : 576 pixels
Display aspect ratio                     : 4:3      
Frame rate mode                          : Constant
Frame rate                               : 23.976 (24000/1001) FPS
Color space                              : YUV                                                                         
Chroma subsampling                       : 4:2:0
Bit depth                                : 8 bits       
Scan type                                : Progressive
Bits/(Pixel*Frame)                       : 0.264  
Stream size                              : 422 MiB (88%)
```

Codec details of the output
```
Video                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
ID                                       : 1                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Format                                   : AVC                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Format/Info                              : Advanced Video Codec                                                                                                                                                                                
Format profile                           : High@L5                                                                                                                                                                                             
Format settings                          : CABAC / 16 Ref Frames                                                                                                                                                                               
Format settings, CABAC                   : Yes                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Format settings, Reference frames        : 16 frames                                                                                                                                                                                           
Codec ID                                 : V_MPEG4/ISO/AVC                                                                                                                                                                                     
Duration                                 : 21 min 4 s                                                                                                                                                                                          
Bit rate                                 : 2 442 kb/s                                                                                                                                                                                          
Width                                    : 960 pixels                                                                                                                                                                                          
Height                                   : 720 pixels                                                                                                                                                                                          
Display aspect ratio                     : 4:3                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Frame rate mode                          : Constant                                                                                                                                                                                            
Frame rate                               : 23.976 (24000/1001) FPS                                                                                                                                                                             
Color space                              : YUV                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Chroma subsampling                       : 4:2:0                                                                                                                                                                                               
Bit depth                                : 8 bits                                                                                                                                                                                              
Scan type                                : Progressive                                                                                                                                                                                         
Bits/(Pixel*Frame)                       : 0.147                                                                                                                                                                                               
Stream size                              : 368 MiB (91%)  
```

When I initially tried it with the Spirited Away example mentioned in the README.md, it worked perfectly. 

Could this behavior be caused by supplying video2x with 4:3 video files instead of 16:9?
